column4: I am trying to get my Logitech Quickcam express to work in skype or camorama. I have read the ubuntu webcam page which says it should be automatic. When I do lsusb it recognises it. I also tested it in skype and that freezes the whole computer. I have seen the thread with the LD preload and tried it. Still no luck. Any other suggestions? Thank you
I know it's not much help, but my quckcam express WAS recognized automatically. Checked whether it works in windows?
It works it windoze.
oh... and I'm assuming you're using either 8.04 or 8.10 here
very weird
only video input you have? maybe you're using a different device than the quickcam
I have the pc setup to my tv using a monitor cable. But that is output not input.
indeed
what did you setup in the multimedia panel for video input?
only thought is that it is perhaps just too old
please write the name of the person you're talking to. it's getting rather messy to answer otherwise ;)
when you go to system->Preferences->Multimedia System Selector in the second tab, what's in video input?
samyF. ok thank you for that guidance
oh ... And most irc clients have name completion with TAB :)
I have done System>Preferences and do not see mulitmedia selector
Multimedia System Selector actually. YOu're using an english version of ubuntu or another language?
SAMMYF: using English version. Nothing that vagues looks like that
oops ... THAT is weird
you probably missed it, but I sent you a private message :)
can you pastebin what you have in your system>preferences menu, okease?
